scripts.start:dev: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx nest start --watch --builder swc --preserveWatchOutput" "ğŸ”„ Inicio completo con watch (Development)"
scripts.test:quick: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --maxWorkers=4 --bail --passWithNoTests --silent --no-coverage" "ğŸ§ª Tests rÃ¡pidos (Test)"
scripts.test:quick:ultra: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test JEST_MAX_WORKERS=6 jest --maxWorkers=6 --bail --passWithNoTests --silent --no-coverage" "âš¡ Tests ultra rÃ¡pidos (Test)"
scripts.test:quick:esbuild: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --maxWorkers=8 --bail --passWithNoTests --silent --no-coverage --transformIgnorePatterns=node_modules" "âš¡ Tests con esbuild (Test)"
scripts.test:quick:esbuild:ultra: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test JEST_USE_ESBUILD=true jest --maxWorkers=8 --bail --passWithNoTests --silent --no-coverage" "ğŸš€ Tests con esbuild ultra rÃ¡pidos (Test)"
scripts.test:quick:typesafe: node scripts/timed-run.js "npm run type-check && cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --maxWorkers=6 --bail --passWithNoTests --silent --no-coverage" "ğŸ›¡ï¸ Tests rÃ¡pidos con verificaciÃ³n de tipos (Test)"
scripts.test:quick:hybrid: node scripts/timed-run.js "npm run type-check && cross-env NODE_ENV=test JEST_USE_ESBUILD=true jest --maxWorkers=6 --bail --passWithNoTests --silent --no-coverage" "âš¡ Tests hÃ­bridos: velocidad + tipos (Test)"
scripts.test:full: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test JEST_COVERAGE=true jest --coverage --maxWorkers=2 --bail --passWithNoTests --silent" "ğŸ“Š Tests completos con coverage (Test)"
scripts.test:full:coverage: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test JEST_COVERAGE=true jest --coverage --maxWorkers=2 --bail --passWithNoTests --silent --coverageThreshold" "ğŸ“Š Tests completos con validaciÃ³n de cobertura (Test)"
scripts.test:full:ultra: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test JEST_COVERAGE=true JEST_MAX_WORKERS=4 jest --coverage --maxWorkers=4 --bail --passWithNoTests --silent" "ğŸ“Š Tests completos ultra rÃ¡pidos con coverage (Test)"
scripts.test:debug: node scripts/timed-run.js "node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand" "ğŸ› Tests con debug mode"
scripts.test:e2e:quick: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json --maxWorkers=1 --bail --silent --testTimeout=3000" "ğŸš€ E2E tests rÃ¡pidos (Test)"
scripts.test:e2e:full: node scripts/timed-run.js "cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json --maxWorkers=1 --bail --silent" "ğŸ“Š E2E tests completos (Test)"
scripts.validate:quick: npm run format && npm run type-check && npm run lint:check
scripts.validate:staged: npm run format && npm run type-check && npm run lint:check && npm run test:staged
scripts.validate:staged:ultra: npm run format && npm run type-check && npm run lint:check && npm run test:staged:ultra
scripts.validate:full: npm run format && npm run type-check && npm run lint:check && npm run test:full && npm run test:e2e:full
scripts.validate:full:ultra: npm run format && npm run type-check && npm run lint:check && npm run test:full:ultra && npm run test:e2e:full
